app_tagline: Поделитесь одной ссылкой. Маршрутизируйте по намерению.
onboarding_routes_description: Добавьте несколько ссылок и организуйте их по намерениям. Посетители выбирают, куда идти, исходя из своих потребностей.
onboarding_routes_example_text: Ссылайтесь на свой календарь, портфолио или форму обратной связи - все с одного URL!
onboarding_files_description: Создавайте дропы файлов, где посетители могут отправлять файлы напрямую без входа в систему.
onboarding_files_usecase_text: Собирайте резюме, файлы дизайна или документы без вложений электронной почты.
onboarding_getstarted_description: Войдите, чтобы создать свой профиль OneLink и начните делиться своей единственной ссылкой повсюду.
auth_sign_in_description: Мы отправим вам волшебную ссылку по электронной почте.
auth_magic_link_sent: Волшебная ссылка отправлена! Проверьте свою электронную почту.
auth_view_onboarding: Впервые здесь? Узнайте, как работает OneLink
dashboard_inbox_clear_all_confirm: Вы уверены, что хотите очистить все элементы входящих? Это действие нельзя отменить.
dashboard_account_analytics_description: Отслеживание кликов по вашим ссылкам и загрузок
dashboard_account_slug_taken: Этот слаг уже занят. Пожалуйста, выберите другой.
dashboard_account_profile_link_descripti: Поделитесь этой ссылкой, чтобы люди могли получить доступ к вашему профилю
dashboard_account_profile_qr_pro_feature: QR-код — это функция Pro. Обновитесь, чтобы разблокировать!
dashboard_account_profile_qr_description: Отсканируйте этот QR-код, чтобы получить доступ к вашему профилю
settings_description: Управляйте настройками и предпочтениями вашей учетной записи
settings_domain_help: Используйте свой домен для профиля OneLink
settings_export_description: Скачайте все ваши данные в формате JSON (GDPR)
settings_preferences_save_error: Не удалось сохранить настройки. Попробуйте еще раз.
settings_change_password_description: Update your account password to keep your account secure.
settings_change_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
settings_change_password_different: New password must be different from current password
settings_change_password_update_failed: Failed to update password. Please try again.
settings_2fa_description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings_2fa_not_enabled_description: Protect your account by enabling two-factor authentication. You'll need an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
settings_2fa_setup_step1_description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app to add your account.

settings_2fa_secret_key_description: Can't scan? Enter this code manually in your authenticator app.
settings_2fa_backup_codes_description: Save these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your device.
settings_2fa_verification_code_descripti: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
settings_2fa_code_incorrect: Incorrect verification code. Please try again.

settings_2fa_disable_warning: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how OneLink collects, uses, and protects your data.

sections.title: Introduction
paragraphs: OneLink helps you share a single link connected to multiple destinations, routes, and file drops.
By using OneLink, you trust us with your information. This policy explains what data we collect, why, and how we protect it.

sections.title: Information We Collect
paragraphs: We collect only the data needed to operate OneLink effectively:
items: Account information such as your email, display name, avatar, and language preferences
Content you add to your profile: links, drops, descriptions, and files submitted to you
Usage analytics, including aggregated link clicks and drop submissions
Technical data (browser, operating system, IP address) to secure your account and prevent abuse

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
paragraphs: We use your data to:
items: Provide and maintain the OneLink service
Personalize your dashboard experience (language, theme, plan limits)
Send critical product updates, notifications, or export files you request
Improve reliability and detect suspicious activity

sections.title: Legal Basis for Processing
paragraphs: Under GDPR (Article 6), we process your personal data based on:
items: **Contractual necessity**: To provide OneLink services (account creation, profile management, file storage)
**Consent**: For optional features like marketing emails (you can withdraw at any time)
**Legitimate interests**: For security, fraud prevention, service improvement, and analytics
**Legal obligation**: For tax, accounting, and compliance requirements

sections.title: Data Storage & Security
paragraphs: We rely on Supabase (Postgres + storage) to securely host your data in the EU.
File uploads are encrypted at rest. Access to internal tooling requires authentication and audit logging.

sections.title: Data Retention
paragraphs: We retain your data only as long as necessary:
items: **Active accounts**: Until you delete your account or request deletion
**Inactive accounts**: 2 years after last activity, then automatic deletion
**Files in drops**: Until the drop is deleted or your account is deleted
**Analytics data**: Aggregated and anonymized after 2 years
**Legal requirements**: As required by law (e.g., invoices for 10 years for tax purposes)

sections.title: When We Share Data
paragraphs: We share data only with trusted subprocessors essential to the product:
items: Supabase for authentication, database, and storage
Stripe for secure payments and invoicing (for Pro plans)
Error monitoring or analytics tools to maintain uptime

sections.title: International Data Transfers
paragraphs: Your data is primarily stored in the EU (Supabase). If we transfer data outside the EU:
We use Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission.
We ensure adequate protection levels and comply with GDPR transfer requirements (Articles 44-49).
All transfers are documented and subject to appropriate safeguards.

sections.title: Your GDPR Rights
paragraphs: Under GDPR (Articles 15-22), you have the following rights:
items: **Right of Access (Article 15)**: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
**Right to Rectification (Article 16)**: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
**Right to Erasure (Article 17)**: "Right to be forgotten" - request deletion of your data
**Right to Restriction (Article 18)**: Limit how we process your data in certain circumstances
**Right to Data Portability (Article 20)**: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
**Right to Object (Article 21)**: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
**Right to Withdraw Consent**: Withdraw consent at any time (where consent is the legal basis)

sections.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
paragraphs: To exercise any of these rights:
• Use Settings → Data export for data access and portability
• Use Settings → Privacy & Security → Delete Account for erasure
• Email support@getonelink.app for any other requests
We will respond within 30 days as required by GDPR.

sections.title: Cookies & Tracking
paragraphs: We use the following technologies:
items: **Essential cookies/storage**: Session management and authentication (required, no consent needed)
**Functional storage**: Theme and language preferences via localStorage (required for service functionality)
**Analytics**: Aggregated usage statistics (if applicable, requires consent)

sections.title: What We Do NOT Use
paragraphs: We do NOT use:
• Third-party advertising cookies
• Social media tracking pixels
• Cross-site tracking
• Behavioral advertising

sections.title: Children's Privacy
paragraphs: OneLink is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us at support@getonelink.app and we will delete such information.

sections.title: Data Breach Notification
paragraphs: In case of a data breach affecting your personal data:
• We will notify the relevant supervisory authority within 72 hours (GDPR Article 33)
• We will notify affected users without undue delay if the breach poses a high risk (GDPR Article 34)
• We will provide details about the breach, affected data, and mitigation steps taken

sections.title: Automated Decision-Making
paragraphs: We do not use automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal effects or significantly affects you (GDPR Article 22).

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
paragraphs: We may update this policy as OneLink evolves. We will post the new version here and update the "Last updated" date.
Material changes will be communicated via email or in-app notification.

sections.title: Contact
paragraphs: Questions about privacy? Reach out to support@getonelink.app and we will get back to you.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using OneLink.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
paragraphs: By accessing or using OneLink, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
If you do not agree, do not use the service.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
paragraphs: OneLink lets you create a single profile URL with multiple routes, drops, and analytics.
You are responsible for the content you publish and must comply with applicable laws.

sections.title: 3. Accounts & Security
paragraphs: You must provide accurate account information and keep it up to date.
You are responsible for safeguarding your account and notifying us of unauthorized use.

sections.title: 4. Acceptable Use
paragraphs: You agree not to:
items: Upload malicious content, viruses, or attempt to breach OneLink's security
Use OneLink for spam, phishing, harassment, or illegal activities
Misrepresent your identity or impersonate others
Violate any applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights
Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
Use automated systems to access the service without authorization

sections.title: 5. Content Ownership & Intellectual Property
paragraphs: You retain ownership of all content you upload to OneLink (links, files, profile information).
By uploading content, you grant OneLink a limited, non-exclusive license to store, display, and process your content solely to provide the service.
You are responsible for ensuring you have the right to upload any content you submit.
OneLink's trademarks, logos, and service marks are our property and may not be used without permission.

sections.title: 6. Plans & Billing
paragraphs: Free accounts have plan limits (4 links max, 2 drops max). Pro subscriptions are billed monthly or annually via Stripe according to the pricing on our website.
We reserve the right to change prices with 30 days notice. Price changes will not affect your current billing period.

sections.title: 7. Refund Policy
paragraphs: Pro plan subscriptions are billed in advance. Refunds are available within 14 days of initial purchase or renewal.
To request a refund, contact support@getonelink.app. Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5-10 business days.
No refunds are available for partial billing periods or after 14 days from purchase.

sections.title: 6. Termination
paragraphs: You can delete your account at any time in Settings.
We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or applicable laws.

sections.title: 7. Disclaimer
paragraphs: OneLink is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability.

sections.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
paragraphs: To the maximum extent permitted by law, OneLink is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

sections.title: 9. Governing Law
paragraphs: These Terms are governed by the laws of France. Disputes will be handled in French courts.

sections.title: 10. Changes
paragraphs: We may update these Terms. Continued use of OneLink after changes means you accept the revised Terms.

sections.title: 11. Contact
paragraphs: Need help? Email support@getonelink.app.

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that matches your stage. Start free, upgrade when ready.
pricing.currency_note: Цены в USD. Могут применяться налоги.
pricing.cta_description: Our free plan covers the basics. Upgrade to unlock custom domains, unlimited routes, advanced analytics, and more.

free.name: Бесплатно
free.description: Идеально для запуска вашего профиля и обмена важными ссылками.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Для создателей и малого бизнеса, которым нужен сбор файлов.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Для профессионалов, которым нужны большие загрузки файлов и детальная аналитика.

faq.question: Can I switch plans later?
faq.answer: Yes. Upgrade or downgrade at any time from the billing page. Changes apply immediately and unused time is prorated.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: If you experience issues, contact support within 14 days and we'll work with you on a fair solution.

faq.question: Is OneLink GDPR compliant?
faq.answer: Yes. Data is hosted in the EU with Supabase. You can export or delete your data at any time from Settings.

checkout_success.title: You're in!
checkout_success.subtitle: Thanks for upgrading to OneLink Pro.

checkout_cancel.title: Checkout cancelled
checkout_cancel.subtitle: No worries—your account is unchanged.
checkout_cancel.message: Feel free to retry the upgrade or continue exploring the free plan for now.

dashboard_content_links_empty: Пока нет ссылок. Создайте свою первую ссылку выше!
settings_delete_account_description: Это действие нельзя отменить. Все ваши данные будут удалены навсегда.
settings_delete_account_warning_descript: Удаление аккаунта навсегда удалит все ваши данные, включая профиль, ссылки, дропы и отправки. Это действие нельзя отменить.
settings_delete_account_mfa_requires_2fa: Двухфакторная аутентификация (2FA) должна быть включена для удаления аккаунта. Это добавляет дополнительный уровень безопасности для защиты вашего аккаунта.

settings_delete_account_confirm_text: Я понимаю, что это действие необратимо и все мои данные будут удалены навсегда.
settings_delete_account_success: Удаление аккаунта начато. Вы будете разлогинены в ближайшее время.
settings_delete_account_error: Не удалось удалить аккаунт. Пожалуйста, проверьте пароль и попробуйте снова.

settings_domain_dns_subdomain_descriptio: Add a CNAME record pointing to Vercel:
settings_domain_dns_apex_description: Add an A record pointing to Vercel's IP:
settings_domain_dns_apex_note: Note: Some DNS providers support ALIAS records or CNAME flattening for apex domains. Check your provider's documentation.
settings_domain_dns_note: After adding DNS records, it may take a few minutes to hours for changes to propagate. Vercel will automatically issue an SSL certificate once DNS is configured correctly.
